name: Why U Drunk
description:
Controls

- WSAD or arrows to move

- Left Click to shoot, pick up or put down item

- P to pause

Instructions

You’re simple drunkard with unusual problems.

You’ve drunked too much and when it happens, your worst nightmares comes after you. Your wife says that they’re only drunken hallucinations but you know that it feels so real … you can feel them behind the doors … brace yourself, build barricades, shot them with all you got. This room is your last and only resort.

Description

The game was created for The Indie Tales Jam in 72 hours by the team of two.

https://itch.io/jam/indie-tales-jam/rate/1119825

The theme of the game jam was One Room

We hope you enjoy this game. Have fun!

Development team

- Kongo (programming, art and animation)

- JayaSheel (music and sound effects)
